qas.question: On 20 May 2009 which Queen members performed We are the Champions on American Idol?
What was the name of the Greatest Hits compilation Queen released after the split from Paul Rodgers?
Which two American idol contestants performed a duet with Queen on American Idol?

answers.text: winner Kris Allen and runner-up Adam Lambert

qas.question: What day in 2009 was Queen's Absolute Greatest released?

context: On 20 May 2009, <a0_0>May and Taylor<a0_0/> performed "We Are the Champions" live on the season finale of American Idol with <a2_0>winner Kris Allen and runner-up Adam Lambert<a2_0/> providing a vocal duet. In mid-2009, after the split of Queen + Paul Rodgers, the Queen online website announced a new greatest hits compilation named <a1_0>Absolute Greatest<a1_0/>. The album was released on <a3_0>16 November<a3_0/> and peaked at number 3 in the official UK Chart. The album contains 20 of Queen's biggest hits spanning their entire career and was released in four different formats: single disc, double disc (with commentary), double disc with feature book, and a vinyl record. Prior to its release, a competition was run by Queen online to guess the track listing as a promotion for the album.
